html:
4.12.19  8:59 am   how to survive a wedding?

     make your own wedding, in self defense

4.12.19  5:59 am   (4.10.19  1:27 pm ) Mind sharing the reason why?

     if many questions are asked, some have to be weird. it doesn't matter which ones, that's just what weird means

4.12.19  3:25 am   How do you always know the right thing to say?

     no one does

4.12.19  2:38 am   what's the first thought you had upon waking last morning?

     trying to recall what shape the world is

4.12.19  1:54 am   would you please share a lesson you learned recently?

     they are conflicting lessons. currently it's "war of the lessons." there is an argument going on about whether time takes too much time or not enough

4.12.19  1:19 am   are you an enlightened being?

     it's on my to do list

4.12.19  12:35 am   have you got any sleeping tips

     no

4.12.19  12:21 am   is it legal to make laws?

      the legality of laws is wrapped up in a quantum superposition

4.12.19  12:06 am   Why is the climate in Brazil so crazy?

     you'll have to come there to see

4.11.19  11:47 pm   Where is old jersey I can't find it

      here

4.11.19  11:43 pm   4.8.19  12:23 pm are you insinuating crying is a weakness? 

     not even close

4.11.19  11:37 pm   What do you think of the font Hoefler Text?

     oh it's fuckin world class

4.11.19  10:53 pm   What do I do? Throughout the day I like to make up songs in my head I'd love to make (mostly because of you, thanks Bill) but I have no way to do it. All I have is a 25-key flat keyboard from Sharper Image and no musical know-how to save my life. Thank if you can help! 

     in this situation, the first thing you want to try is your voice. the next thing would be like tapping various things (percussion)

4.11.19  10:04 pm   Is it worth it to buy a fender Rhodes keyboard when I can just find a setting on a synthesizer that is pretty similar 

     3 disadvantages of a real Rhodes that i can think of: they weigh 3,000 pounds, there's no pitch bend, no mod wheel, and to get the most interesting sounds out of it you are probably going to need several additional 3,000 pound devices

4.11.19  9:32 pm   Thoughts on constructed languages?

     the language sometimes prefers to construct itself

4.11.19  9:15 pm   You ever have much success using the Multiband compressor?

     just learning. it's scary but powerful

     Useful for bass and kick drums in my experience

     that's true

4.11.19  8:39 pm   what is the best song in your opinion?

     you must make your own best song

4.11.19  8:18 pm   ok so who tf are you please no vauge responses 

     bill wurtz [ billwurtz.com  youtube  spotify  pandora  soundcloud  twitter  instagram ]

4.11.19  6:46 pm   opinion on "basic people"?

     that's your opinion on someone unspecified

4.11.19  6:45 pm   why do you answer questions at 1 AM

     why do you ask them at 6:45 pm

4.11.19  6:04 pm   WOULD YOU LIKE AN  E G G

     no

4.11.19  5:50 pm   I just listened to your songs on Soundcloud for the first time and realised they are ever so slightly different from the YouTube versions.

     the audio is exactly the same. the video is different because there's no video

      Why?

     soundcloud does not allow video

4.11.19  5:40 pm   do you think the people of earth will one day live peacefully or are we a doomed species?

     we are trying to figure something out

4.11.19  5:08 pm   Gibson es 345, or Gibson es 330? 

     never heard of either

4.11.19  4:25 pm   How would you recommend making music without access to expensive software

     what do you have access too

4.11.19  4:06 pm   can you play guitar?

     i know how they work, mostly

      because on the questions page you insinuate that you cannot, however I remember seeing a photo on your instagram of little bill playing guitar.

     this is to demonstrate the world renowned skill of holding a guitar correctly (i think)

4.11.19  2:44 pm   how do i love stuff

     like it 100 times or more

4.11.19  2:28 pm   have you decided yet what kind of content you want to release next? If it's a song, what key is it in?

     D

4.11.19  2:04 pm   do you come up with the anagrams on the "scarmble" page?

     not the pink part but the grey part. and when they were blue, the blue part and the grey part

4.11.19  1:47 pm   little confused, when I see a C-   ⃤    (C minor triangle) does this mean Cmin(maj7)?

     i think so. i usually avoid the triangle because it seems not 100% clear

4.11.19  1:16 pm   how do you determine the arrangement of the letters in your title designs? ('ueqstions', 'snogs', 'zzja', for example)

     artfully, together with the colors

4.11.19  12:53 pm   I'm torn between buying a MIDI controller keyboard and bringing my laptop to gigs or buying a keyboard with built in sounds... what's your take on the matter?

     laptops at gigs make me uncomfortable. i've actually seen one crash on a gig

4.11.19  12:47 pm   what kind of bread do you like

     scrambled

4.11.19  12:11 pm   in "got to know whats going on", is this a song where you are telling someone a message ("i know you think that its over but maybe were getting closer") or are you telling this stuff to yourself?

     it goes how it goes .... only you know how it is used

4.11.19  12:11 pm   what is a thing that you like to do that i could probably do

     advance modern science (if possible)

4.11.19  11:22 am   why do people answer the question "do you mind if i do that" with "sure" when in fact they mean to say "no, i don't mind"

     because it is such a close ghost cousin of 'is it ok'

4.11.19  10:56 am   I have basic video editing software that I have been using to make videos for my music.  Problem is, I find the way I use this software to be not unique to me in style.  I use it to layer colors and text and images and such.  I know I am very inspired by you, but I don't know if what I am doing is copying you or just doing what I can with what I have.  It bothers me that the word copycat is being used by some people to describe how your style might be influencing others. But I dont know if it's bothering me because i know i should feel bad about not having an entirely original video aesthetic or if the word just doesnt seem fair to others who are doing their best with tools.   Making the music takes time, making the videos takes time, somehow this way of making videos just feels so intuitive.  Like it's the most effective and efficient way to make content that is of some quality.   I'm not sure how to feel about it.  Would you advise me to steer clear of this way of editing?  I get a bit panicky when I think of turning up the different dial because I dont know how to conceptualize another video style that feels like it has quality to it but doesnt take forever to make (using only my simple tools).  Am I screwed?  Part of me does feel bad because I feel like if I'm good enough I should know what to do about this problem.

     all you need to do is rotate the waterfall of energy you have poured into this rumination, and instead direct it straight into the project

4.11.19  10:18 am   mr wurtz, how do you feel about horseshoe theory

     fine

4.11.19  9:25 am   Do you have any inspiration for songs

     too much

      or are they mostly made off of the top of your head?

     they can come from virtually anywhere. inspiration flows in all directions, at every coordinate

4.11.19  5:26 am   I just got fired. What to do?

     hire the person who fired you, then fire them

4.11.19  1:58 am   What's your spaghetti policy?

     thrash

4.11.19  1:39 am   i am young and making music and no one listens to it. and the hottest artist in the world is younger than me, and it is giving me a crisis. what am i supposed to do

     it's important to remember when you see famous young people, they may not actually represent the average age of all the people it took to create and bring that music to market. if you compare the types of work you are doing with the other people in corresponding roles in popular music, i think you might find they are a bit older

4.11.19  1:39 am   Are songs mantras?

     sure

      Which of yours do you think is the most mantralike?

     i hate myself

4.11.19  12:44 am   if someone you met asked to be referred to by they/them pronouns what would you do

     do that

4.11.19  12:02 am   What's your opinion on sting rays???

     i respect them and i think they deserve proper funding

4.10.19  10:42 pm   is any of the dialogue in your videos improvised, or is it all scripted out beforehand?

     videos in 2019, 2018, 2017, 2016 are nearly entirely script. non-song short videos on thursdays in early 2015 were usually based on improvised 1 liners. the reality page is 100% improvised material, and the improv pages are also improvised

4.10.19  10:25 pm   What type of guitar do you like the most? Acoustic? Dobro? Electric? Bass?

     it depends on the situation

4.10.19  10:13 pm   I've been asked to join a church choir and I'm thinking of doing it even though I have not sung in any sort of organized fashion in 20 or so years. Do you have any singing advice?

     the best first advice is to go there and see how it goes

4.10.19  9:10 pm   Do you suffer from depression

     no

      if not what is your reaction to depressed people

     it's a good learning experience for me, and i try to answer all of those ones, because they are such a challenge for me to answer properly

4.10.19  9:10 pm   How to become one with the microwave

     dial in the amount of time you wish for your frozen meal to be heated
